On 8/23/06, Pat Farrell <pfarrell@...> wrote:
> The signal to noise ratio of this mailing list is very low.
> Some people believe in testing, some don't. There is zero chance that
> minds will be changed.
>

I highly recommend gmail for reading newsgroups like this one. It has
a rant detector. It automatically threads discussions (very
effectively, I might add) and puts a little number next to each
thread. That number is the rantness rating of the thread. You are then
free to ignore the ranty threads.

Kevin
